newsitem.title: ITALY: Italian CPI in '97 will be 2.1-2.2 pct - Ciampi.
newsitem.headline: Italian CPI in '97 will be 2.1-2.2 pct - Ciampi.

text.p: Average Italian inflation in 1997 will be between 2.1 to 2.2 percent, Treasury Minister Carlo Azeglio Ciampi told a sitting of the joint parliamentary budget commission on Wednesday.
The official target is 2.5 percent for this year.
"We will certainly close 1997 with inflation between 2.1 and 2.2 percent," Ciampi told the commission.
National statistics office Istat said earlier that inflation in May was 1.6 percent year-on-year. -- Rome newsroom +396 6782501
